# Twitter/X, Mastodon

```
Weeb-CLI - The ultimate terminal anime experience!

- No browser, no ads, just pure anime
- Multiple sources (TR/EN)
- Smart downloads with Aria2 & yt-dlp
- MAL/AniList sync
- Discord RPC integration

Terminal weebs, this one's for you!

pip install weeb-cli

https://github.com/ewgsta/weeb-cli
```
